data.title: The Forgotten Life of Herschel Grynszpan
authors: Museum of Jewish Heritage — A Living Memorial to the Holocaust
data.meta_description: In November 1938, Herschel Grynszpan assassinated Nazi diplomat Ernst vom Rath. His actions would be used as justification for Kristallnacht.
data.meta_site_name: Museum of Jewish Heritage — A Living Memorial to the Holocaust
